ORDER

Learned counsel appearing for the
petitioners seeks permission to withdraw this
petition with liberty to file another petition if it
become necessary.

Permission granted.

Accordingly, this Crl.M.C is dismissed as
withdrawn reserving liberty with the petitioners to
file another petition if it becomes necessary.

Sd/-
K.ABRAHAM MATHEW
